original_title: SL, Australia to hold bilateral talks in Colombo
original_body_lines: The 4th Round of Foreign Office Bilateral Consultations, Second Strategic Maritime Dialogue and Third Joint Trade and Investment Committee Meeting between Sri Lanka and Australia will be held on 11 and 12 July 2023 at the Ministry of Foreign Affairs in Colombo.

These Meetings will be co-chaired by First Assistant Secretary of the Department of Foreign Affairs and Trade of Australia Gary Cowan, Additional Secretary (Bilateral East) Yasoja Gunasekera, and o Ministry of Foreign Affairs Additional Secretary (Economic Affairs) Shanika Dissanayake and Ministry of Trade, Commerce and Food Security Secretary A.M.P.M.B. Atapattu.

The meetings are expected to assess the status of bilateral relations covering ongoing cooperation and areas of shared interest including political, trade and investment, defence, tourism, agriculture, education, health and in the field of sports.
The previous sessions of the above three bilateral mechanism were held in September 2019.
